item.title: Sean 'Diddy' Combs trial updates: Cassie Ventura takes the stand
item.description: Sean "Diddy" Combs is standing trial on sex trafficking and racketeering charges in a case that has captured widespread attention.

item.title: LIVE:  ABC News Live
item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events

item.title: Trump admin live updates: Trump family business a key factor during Middle East trip
item.description: President Donald Trump said Monday the tariffs against China would "go up substantially higher" than 145% if a longer-term trade deal is not reached before 90 days.

item.title: US egg prices fall for the first time in months but remain near record highs
item.description: Retail egg prices in the United States fell last month after setting records at the start of the year, according to government data

item.title: WATCH:  New drone video shows a great white shark spotted off Montauk, NY
item.description: The shark was spotted gliding close to shore.

item.title: WATCH:  Edan Alexander reunites with family after being freed from Hamas captivity
item.description: Footage released by an IDF spokesperson shows Edan Alexander's mother, Yael Alexander, reuniting with her son following his release from Hamas custody after being held hostage for 584 days.

item.title: WATCH:  Child undergoes breakthrough heart procedure
item.description: A child with a mechanical heart valve has received a living donor valve for the first time.

item.title: WATCH:  Clemson president and daughter ‘bear hug’ at college graduation
item.description: Clemson’s president, Jim Clements, got the hug of a lifetime from his daughter, Grace, while presenting her with her degree.

item.title: WATCH:  Death threats against MLB pitcher spark Houston police investigation
item.description: ABC News’ Alex Presha reported on Houston police and Major League Baseball investigating death threats made against Astros pitcher Lance McCullers Jr. and his young children.

item.title: WATCH:  Animals react as earthquake rattles Tennessee
item.description: Animals reacted as a 4.1 preliminary magnitude earthquake rattled parts of Tennessee Saturday. No injuries or damages were immediately reported.

item.title: WATCH:  Nashville Zoo announces birth of tiny southern pudu
item.description: Nashville Zoo celebrated Mother’s Day early as it announced the birth of a male southern pudu.

item.title: WATCH:  What's next for America's first Pope, Leo XIV
item.description: ABC News' Maggie Rulli takes a look at what a Pope Leo XIV papacy may look like.

item.title: WATCH:  Leo XIV celebrates first mass as pope
item.description: American-born Cardinal Robert Francis Prevost, now Pope Leo XIV, celebrated his first mass as the new leader of the Roman Catholic Church.

item.title: WATCH:  Why cardinals chose Pope Leo XIV
item.description: ABC News contributor and Catholic commentator Gloria Purvis weighed in on why she thinks cardinals ultimately chose Chicago’s Robert Prevost — who is now Pope Leo XIV.

item.title: WATCH:  Newly elected Pope Leo XIV addresses crowd at St. Peter’s
item.description: The new pontiff made his first public appearance as Pope Leo XIV on a balcony at St. Peter’s Basilica.

item.title: WATCH:  Cardinal Robert Prevost becomes 1st American pope
item.description: A senior cardinal deacon, who stood on the balcony on the facade of St. Peter's Basilica, made the announcement.

item.title: House GOP plows ahead on $880 billion in Medicaid, other cuts to advance Trump agenda
item.description: House GOP plows ahead to advance key components of its bill to fund Trump’s agenda -- including taxes and Medicaid cuts -- even as they remain at odds within.

item.title: For diplomats, Trump taps more friends, supporters than any recent president: Experts
item.description: President Trump has tapped a roster of ambassadors with more personal and financial ties than any recent president, former diplomats and policy experts told ABC News.

item.title: Trump admin asks SCOTUS for permission to deport nearly 200 Venezuelan migrants
item.description: On Monday, President Donald Trump's administration said the nearly 200 Venezuelan migrants “have proven to be especially dangerous to maintain in prolonged detention.”

item.title: Trump's tariffs face their 1st legal test against small businesses
item.description: In an obscure courthouse in downtown Manhattan, a group of small businesses will take on one of President Donald Trump's boldest uses of executive authority.

item.title: Winners of Trump's meme coin contest potentially include foreign investors
item.description: The top crypto holders of the Trump meme coin have won tickets to a private Trump gala -- representing a potential conflict of interest if there are foreign investors.

item.title: Trump defends Qatar jumbo jet offer
item.description: During a press briefing in the White House on Monday, before embarking on a four-day trip to the Middle East, Trump called the donation a "very nice gesture."

item.title: What's in the US-China trade framework?
item.description: The U.S. agreed to temporarily slash tariffs on Chinese goods from 145% to 30%.

item.title: House Republicans propose $5 billion for private school vouchers
item.description: House Republicans want to set aside up to $5 billion a year for scholarships to help families send their children to private and religious schools, marking an unprecedented effort to use public money to pay for private education

item.title: Democrats pivot to talk more about the economy and less about immigration
item.description: Democrats have long focused on immigration when courting Latino voters in states like Arizona, Nevada, New Jersey and Florida, where generations of Latin American immigrants have settled and gained permanent legal status
